name: Pixel Noir (itch)
description:
Plot:

After a lot of sleepless nights, you've traced Mr. Big's bootlegging gang to the abandoned mine. Fight your way through a rogues gallery of lethal lugs and malicious molls in a challenging NES inspired platformer.

Controls:

Play using controller or keyboard (menus only work with mouse but the game works with controller)

Controller bindings;

Move left and right with the left analog stick.

Jump and shoot with the Y and X buttons.

You can jump once in the air.

Hold down the shoot button to continuously shoot.

Keyboard bindings:

Move left and right with the left and right arrow keys.

Jump and shoot with the Z and X keys.

You can jump once in the air.

Hold the shoot button down to continue shooting.

You won't change facing direction while you are shooting so feel free to back away from enemies while you are firing on them.

Music Credit:

Special thanks to Kevin Namikata for the great music track!

Check out Kevin's website at: fictiumsounddesign.com
